properties.title: Welcome to the AJF Persistence Developer Website

section.name: Welcome
section.p:
This project contain the documentation of the Persistence CDI extension for AJF.
The goal of the persistence extension is to provide helper classes and automatic implementation for use with JPA in a J2EE and Web environment.
It provide the following functionalities :
Automatic implementation of Interface with method annotated with @NamedQuery
Automatic implementation of Interface with method annotated with @StoredProcedure
Audit data listener
CDI Provider for EntityManager and EntityManagerFactory
The persistence extension is split into four part :
ajf-persist-api : Contain the public class, annotations and interfaces users of the ajf framework can use in there persistence implementation.
ajf-persist-impl : Contain the implementation use by the framework. This where you will find the meat of how the persistence framework is working.
ajf-persist-tests : Contain the integration tests for different scenarios
ajf-persist-docs : The user guide.
ajf-persist-dist : Contain the distribution assembly.
